titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to treat payments under the Conservation Reserve Program as rentals from real estate.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

term.name: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

bill.summary: 3/30/2004--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to treat conservation reserve program payments as real estate rentals and thus excluded from consideration in self-employment net earnings. Amends the Social Security Act to treat such payments similarly for purposes of old, age, survivors, and disability insurance (OASDI) benefits.
